rationale: The segment describes negative facts (killed, slaughter) but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The outbreak in the town of Oinacu near the Bulgarian border killed 6,770 birds and led to the slaughter of the rest of the flock of nearly 34,000 animals, the Paris-based body [OIE] said, quoting information from Romania's health authorities.
